branchCategory.name: M(D)B-Z, Air Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod
branchCategory.description: The MB single rod, double acting, light weight, medium duty tie rod cylinder. Available bore sizes range from 32mm to 125mm. The standard air cushion utilizes a floating cushion seal to eliminate piston rod bouncing. Also available with a rubber end of stroke cushion instead of air cushion.
